Package com.ae2dms.controller

Class FileOperator

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.controller.FileOperator
public class FileOperator
extends java.lang.Object
The project of AE2DMS Coursework of Yizirui FANG 20127091

Package: com.ae2dms.controller

This class is to allow the user the choose the file to load of save supported by the operating system file chooser. The methods of this class will specify the concrete information for the file chooser window and return a File.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    FileOperator()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.io.File selectGameFile​(javafx.stage.Stage loadedStage)
    Get the file path and name according to the user selection extracted from GamePageController.loadGameFile()
    java.io.File selectMusic​(javafx.stage.Stage loadStage)
    load the music file in the *.wav format, return File of the music file.
    java.io.File selectSavedGame​(javafx.stage.Stage loadStage)
    Return the game state specification file.
    java.io.File selectSaveGamePath​(javafx.stage.Stage loadedStage)
    Return the file to save the game state specification file.
